tool_description: Analyzes current traffic conditions to identify congestion patterns, flow rates, and traffic anomalies using machine learning algorithms.

traffic_data.description: Raw traffic data from sensors or APIs

analysis_window.description: Time window for analysis in minutes (5 to 120)

sensitivity.description: Analysis sensitivity level: low, medium, high

error_messages: Insufficient data: Need at least 1 traffic data point and 1 road segment.
Data format error: Traffic data must be properly formatted sensor readings or API responses.
Invalid analysis window: Window must be between 5 and 120 minutes.
Invalid sensitivity: Use one of [low, medium, high].
Analysis failed: Unable to process traffic data due to inconsistent or corrupted input.
usage: Provide traffic_data array and road_segments array for analysis. Optionally set analysis_window for historical comparison and sensitivity for anomaly detection.

analysis_timestamp.description: When the analysis was completed in ISO 8601 format

flow_rates.description: Vehicles per minute for each analyzed segment

anomaly_alerts.description: Detected traffic anomalies or unusual patterns

overall_score.description: Traffic condition score from 1-100 (100 = free flow)
